snippet.title: Evermore Knights Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Evermore Knights is a Turn-based Play-and-Earn JRPG produced by Creo Engine through Nomina Games Studio. 

The game's main story revolves around the journey of a Commissioner (the player) assigned with a mission to find the source of the 'Dread' surrounding Temeris. The storyline will develop as the journey continues, unveiling each character's faith in the game. 

Pre-registration is open: https://creoengine.com/ek-pre-registration

Find us
Official Website: https://evermoreknights.com | https://creoengine.com
Twitter: https://creoengine.com
Telegram: https://t.me/creoenginechannel
Facebook: https://facebook.com/creoengineglobal
Instagram: https://instagram.com/creoengine.offi...
Medium: https://creoengineofficial.medium.com
